name: Tip of The Tongue (KingDwarf)
description:
You know that moment that you have a song in your head, but you can't quite remember it? Now is your chance!

Move with Arrow Keys or WASD.
Interact with E or Enter.
Shoot notes with left CTRL or Space.

Press Alt + Enter for windowed mode.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021 by:

Kyle van den Boom
Tim Ottenhof
Bas du Pré
